name: Battle Box (LowRezJam)
description:
Controls:

  • Roll your cube: Arrow Keys (or Xbox Controller Stick)
  • Shoot: Ctrl (or A on Xbox controller)
  • End turn: Space (or Y on Xbox controller)

Notes:

  • Your cubes only shoot from one face
  • They roll around the arena on their edges
  • Green boxes show remaining health of current cube
  • White boxes show remaining movepoints of current cube
  • Red box (bottom right) shows remaining shots of current cube
  • Turns are time limited
  • Top left of screen shows the turn timer
  • Turns end after time runs out, or all movepoints and shots have been used
  • Defeat the other team to win

LowRezJam is my first attempt to build a game start to finish (Fri to Sun).

Thanks to my fellow game jammers in Guildford for a fun weekend!
